snippet: A collection of 163 Student Opinion questions from this school year still open to comment on our blog. Each asks students to read a short, high-interest nonfiction piece from The Times, then write in response.
abstract: A collection of 163 Student Opinion questions from this school year still open to comment on our blog. Each asks students to read a short, high-interest nonfiction piece from The Times, then write in response.

byline.original: By DANIEL E. SLOTNIK and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

headline.main: 163 Questions to Write or Talk About
